MOBILES

Instagram is a social media platform that allows users to share photos, videos, stories, and reels with friends and the world. It is owned by Meta and is available as a mobile application on both Android and iOS platforms

WhatsApp is a free messaging and calling app that allows you to stay connected with your contacts across your devices. It is available on phones all over the world and can be downloaded for free on Android, iOS, Mac, and Windows

Snapchat is a multimedia messaging app developed by Snap Inc1. It allows users to share photos, videos, and messages that disappear after being viewed
